participant_2.background:
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonald.
I am not married, but I do enjoy online shopping and collecting memories from my vacations.
I enjoy quiet activities in my free time, like reading, writing, and spending time in nature.
i am colour blind.

content.text: I read my favorite book, The Little Prince, to the boy scouts.  I have been in a relationship for 2 years.
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.
That sounds like a busy day!  Do you have a job or do you work from home?
I work from home. I'm a software engineer.
That's a pretty cool job.  I'm a teacher.
I love that!  I love kids.
Me too!  What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to read, write, and spend time in nature.
That sounds peaceful.  I love to travel and experience new things.
I love to travel too!  I'm color blind, so I love to go to new places and see all the different colors.
That's a very interesting perspective.  I love to learn about new cultures.
Me too!  I love to meet new people and learn about their lives.
I think that's great.  I love to make people smile.
I love to do that too!  I love to make people happy.
I think that's a great way to live life.
